# Setting Module

Responsible for managing configurations after the project starts.

---

```
const setting = require('@editor/setting');

setting.name;    // Name defined in the package.json of the launched project
setting.version; // Version defined in the package.json of the launched project
setting.dev;     // Whether in development mode; can be set with --dev when starting the project
setting.args;    // Arguments passed via command line when starting

setting.PATH.HOME;     // Home directory specified for the project; can be passed with --home xxxx
setting.PATH.PROJECT;  // Project directory specified for the project; can be passed with --project xxx
setting.PATH.APP;      // Startup directory of the project
```

---

## Parameters

---

### --project PATH

Defines the project directory to start.

---

### --home PATH

Defines the home directory to start (the global directory where the program runs).

---
